TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Web 应用程序管理 Forms 身份验证服务。

span.span: Manages forms-authentication services for Web applications.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Forms 身份验证对不需要 Windows 身份验证的 Web 应用程序启用用户和密码验证。Forms authentication enables user and password validation for Web applications that do not require Windows authentication. 使用 forms 身份验证时，用户信息存储在外部数据源（如 数据库）中或应用程序的配置文件中。With forms authentication, user information is stored in an external data source, such as a database, or in the configuration file for an application. 对用户进行身份验证后，表单身份验证将在 cookie 或 URL 中维护一个身份验证票证，以便经过身份验证的用户无需为每个请求提供凭据。Once a user is authenticated, forms authentication maintains an authentication ticket in a cookie or in the URL so that an authenticated user does not need to supply credentials with each request. 可以通过将[身份验证](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `mode` 特性设置为 `Forms`来启用窗体身份验证。Forms authentication is enabled by setting the `mode` attribute of the [authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element to `Forms`. 你可以要求对应用程序的所有请求都包含有效的用户身份验证票证，方法是使用[授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))配置元素来拒绝任何未知用户的请求，如以下示例中所示。You can require that all requests to an application contain a valid user authentication ticket by using the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element to deny the request of any unknown user, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 在上面的示例中，对作为应用程序的一部分的 ASP.NET 页面的任何请求都需要由 forms 身份验证提供的有效用户名。In the previous example, any request for an ASP.NET page that is part of the application requires a valid user name that is supplied by forms authentication. 如果用户名称不存在，则会将请求重定向到配置的 。If no user name exists, then the request is redirected to the configured . 类提供对可在对用户进行身份验证的应用程序中使用的方法和属性的访问。The class provides access to methods and properties that you can use in an application that authenticates users. 方法将浏览器重定向到配置的 以便用户登录到应用程序。The method redirects a browser to the configured for users to log into an application. 方法将已经过身份验证的用户重定向回请求的原始受保护 URL 或 。The method redirects an authenticated user back to the original protected URL that was requested or to the . 还提供了一些方法，使你能够根据需要管理 forms 身份验证票证。There are also methods that enable you to manage forms-authentication tickets, if needed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件，该应用程序使用 ASP.NET 成员资格提供程序进行窗体身份验证，并要求所有用户进行身份验证。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that uses the ASP.NET membership provider for forms authentication and requires all users to be authenticated. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示使用 forms authentication 和 ASP.NET 成员身份的 ASP.NET 应用程序的登录页。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application that uses forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/logincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/loginvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证方法验证存储在应用程序配置文件的 "[凭据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100))" 部分中的用户凭据。The Authenticate method verifies user credentials that are stored in the [credentials](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100)) section of the application configuration file. 或者，你可以使用 ASP.NET 成员身份来存储用户凭据并调用 来验证凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials and call the to verify the credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 为了提高安全性，你可以使用 方法对应用程序的配置文件中存储的密码进行加密。For improved security, you can encrypt passwords stored in the configuration file for an application by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了存储在应用程序的 web.config 文件中的用户凭据。The following code example shows user credentials stored in the Web.config file for an application. 密码值已使用 方法进行哈希处理。The password values have been hashed using the method. 此示例使用 SHA1。This example uses SHA1. 由于与 SHA1 冲突，Microsoft 建议使用 SHA256。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends SHA256. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 方法来验证用户凭据的登录页。The following code example shows a login page that uses the method to validate user credentials. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性反映[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `cookieless` 属性的值。The property reflects the value for the `cookieless` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 属性确定 值是存储在浏览器的会话 cookie 中还是存储在 属性中。The property determines whether the value will be stored in a session cookie in the browser or stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 当 值存储在 URI 中时，所生成的 URI 的长度可能超过允许的最大长度。When the value is stored in the URI, the length of the generated URI may be longer than the maximum length allowed. 如果将 属性设置为应用程序名称，并且应用程序名称长（40或更多字符）、应用程序中的用户名较长或在 值中存储长 字符串，则很可能会出现这种情况。This is most likely to occur when the property is set to the application name and the application name is long (40 or more characters), when user names in the application are long, or when long strings are stored in the value. 如果生成的 URI 太长，Web 服务器将返回 `400 - Bad Request` 错误。If the generated URI is too long, the Web server will return a `400 - Bad Request` error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `cookieless` 特性设置为 web.config 文件中 `AutoDetect`。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to `AutoDetect` in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性基于浏览器的 值和功能返回值。The property returns a value based on the value and the capabilities of the browser. - 如果 属性设置为 ， 属性将返回 `true`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true`. - 如果 属性设置为 ， 属性将返回 `false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `false`. - 如果将 属性设置为 ，则如果浏览器支持 cookie 和 cookie， 属性将返回 `true`;否则， 属性将返回 `false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true` if the browser supports cookies and cookies are enabled; otherwise, the property will return `false`. - 如果 属性设置为 ，则如果当前 的 同时支持 cookie 和通过 cookie 重定向， 属性将返回 `true`;否则， 属性将返回 `false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true` if the for the current supports both cookies and redirecting with cookies; otherwise, the property will return `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `cookieless` 特性设置为 web.config 文件中 。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to in the Web.config file. 此配置将导致返回 `false`的 属性。This configuration will result in the property returning `false`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration 元素的 `enableCrossAppRedirects` 属性进行设置。The property value is set using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 重定向 URL 未指向当前应用程序中的页面时，将在 方法中检查 属性。The property is checked within the method when the redirect URL does not point to a page in the current application. 如果 `true`，则执行重定向;如果 `false`，则浏览器将重定向到 属性中定义的页。If is `true`, then the redirect is performed; if is `false`, the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 跨应用程序重定向页面时，必须确保[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素中的特定属性在经过身份验证的应用程序中重复。When you redirect pages across applications, you must make sure that specific attributes in the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[跨应用程序的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当允许跨应用程序重定向时，你的网站容易受到攻击，将用户定向到恶意网站，但使用网站的登录页。When cross-application redirects are allowed, your site is vulnerable to an exploit that directs users to a malicious Web site but uses the login page for your site. 请始终验证 方法返回的重定向 URL 是否为你期望的 URL，以便你可以确保只允许重定向到批准的网站。Always verify that the redirect URL that is returned by the method is a URL that you expect so that you can make sure that you allow redirects only to approved Web sites. 还必须验证重定向 URL 是否使用适当的协议（HTTP 或 HTTPS）。You must also verify that the redirect URL uses the appropriate protocol (HTTP or HTTPS). 若要执行这些验证，可以将回发事件处理程序添加到登录页，也可以为 控件的 事件添加处理程序。To perform these verifications, you can add a postback event handler to your login page, or you can add a handler for the event of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `enableCrossAppRedirects` 特性设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中的 `true`。The following code example sets the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute to `true` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在应用程序代码中执行重定向，而不是使用 方法，则可以使用此方法。You can use this method when you want to perform the redirect in your application code instead of using the method. 方法使用 `ReturnURL` 变量名称返回在查询字符串中指定的 URL。The method returns the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`中， 方法返回 `caller.aspx`返回 URL。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method returns the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果 `ReturnURL` 的变量不存在，则 方法返回 属性中的 URL。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method returns the URL in the property. 当浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl` 变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果 `ReturnUrl` 引用不同应用程序或不同服务器上的页，则 方法返回 属性中的 URL。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods returns the URL in the property. 如果要允许返回 URL 引用当前应用程序之外的页，则必须将 属性设置为 `true` 使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `enableCrossAppRedirects` 特性。If you want to allow the return URL to refer to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 此方法不创建 cookie。This method does not create a cookie. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 属性设置为 "`true` 以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将经过身份验证的用户重定向到 方法返回的 URL。The following code example redirects authenticated users to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序的配置文件中存储 forms 身份验证凭据时， 方法会创建一个可使用的哈希密码值。The method creates a hashed password value that can be used when storing forms-authentication credentials in the configuration file for an application. 存储在应用程序的配置文件中的身份验证凭据由 方法用来验证应用程序用户的密码。Authentication credentials stored in the configuration file for an application are used by the method to verify passwords for users of an application. 或者，你可以使用 ASP.NET 成员身份来存储用户凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例采用用户名、密码和哈希类型，并显示包括用户定义和哈希密码的配置的 "[凭据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100))" 部分。The following code example takes a user name, password, and hash type and displays the [credentials](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100)) section of the configuration that includes the user definition and hashed password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重定向到使用 `ReturnURL` 变量名称在查询字符串中指定的 URL。The method redirects to the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`中， 方法将重定向到 `caller.aspx`返回 URL。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method redirects to the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果 `ReturnURL` 的变量不存在， 方法将重定向到 属性中的 URL。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 当浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl` 变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果 `ReturnUrl` 引用不同应用程序或不同服务器上的页，则 方法将重定向到 属性中的 URL。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods redirects to the URL in the property. 如果要允许重定向到当前应用程序之外的页，则必须将 属性设置为 `true` 使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `enableCrossAppRedirects` 特性。If you want to allow redirects to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 属性设置为 "`true` 以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 如果 `true` 属性，并且 `ReturnUrl` 变量在当前应用程序中，或者 属性为 `true`，则 方法将颁发一个身份验证票证，并使用 方法将其放入默认 cookie 中。If the property is `true`, and either the `ReturnUrl` variable is within the current application or the property is `true`, then the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the default cookie using the method. 如果 `false` 并且重定向路径是当前应用程序中的 URL，则会将该票证作为重定向 URL 的一部分发出。If is `false` and the redirect path is to a URL in the current application, the ticket is issued as part of the redirect URL. 如果 `false`，则 `true`，并且重定向 URL 不引用当前应用程序中的页，则 方法会颁发一个身份验证票证，并将其放在 属性中。If is `false`, is `true`, and the redirect URL does not refer to a page within the remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重定向到使用 `ReturnURL` 变量名称在查询字符串中指定的返回 URL。The method redirects to the return URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`中， 方法将重定向到 `caller.aspx`返回 URL。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method redirects to the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果 `ReturnURL` 的变量不存在， 方法将重定向到 属性中的 URL。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 当浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl` 变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果 `ReturnUrl` 引用不同应用程序或不同服务器上的页，则 方法将重定向到 属性中的 URL。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 如果要允许重定向到当前应用程序之外的页，则必须将 属性设置为 `true` 使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `enableCrossAppRedirects` 特性。If you want to allow redirects to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 属性设置为 "`true` 以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 如果 `true` 属性，并且 `ReturnUrl` 变量在当前应用程序中或 属性为 `true`，则 方法会颁发一个身份验证票证，并使用 `strCookiePath` 方法将其放在由 参数指定的 cookie 中。If the property is `true`, and either the `ReturnUrl` variable is within the current application or the property is `true`, then the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the cookie specified by the `strCookiePath` parameter using the method. 如果 `false` 并且重定向路径是当前应用程序中的 URL，则会将该票证作为重定向 URL 的一部分发出。If is `false` and the redirect path is to a URL in the current application, the ticket is issued as part of the redirect URL. 如果 `false`，则 `true`，并且重定向 URL 不引用当前应用程序中的页，则 方法会颁发一个身份验证票证，并将其放在 属性中。If is `false`, is `true`, and the redirect URL does not refer to a page within the current application, the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中，使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的 `requireSSL` 属性设置 属性值。The property value is set in the configuration file for an ASP.NET application by using the `requireSSL` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 你可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中指定是否需要 SSL （安全套接字层）来通过设置 `requireSSL` 属性将 forms 身份验证 cookie 返回到服务器。You can specify in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application whether SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is required to return the forms-authentication cookie to the server by setting the `requireSSL` attribute . 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 建议将 `requireSSL` 配置为 `false`，同时将 `slidingExpiration` 配置为 `false`，以缩短票证的有效时间。It is recommended that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 web.config 文件中设置 `requireSSL` 特性。The following code example sets the `requireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file. ``` ```

Public Shared Sub SignOut ()

summary.span: 从浏览器删除 Forms 身份验证票证。

span.span: Removes the forms-authentication ticket from the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false`，则 方法会从 cookie 或 URL 中删除 forms 身份验证票证信息。The method removes the forms-authentication ticket information from the cookie or the URL if is `false`. 您可以将 方法与 方法结合使用，以便记录一个用户并允许其他用户登录。You can use the method in conjunction with the method to log one user out and allow a different user to log in. 如果以独占方式在无 cookie 模式下运行，或者如果同时支持经过身份验证的用户和匿名用户，则应显式控制重定向到登录页，前提是需要特殊业务逻辑作为删除匿名标识符的结果来执行。If you run exclusively in cookieless mode, or if you support both authenticated and anonymous users, you should explicitly control the redirect to the login page if you require special business logic to execute as a result of removing the anonymous identifier. 调用 方法时，将通过调用 方法（将 `endResponse` 参数设置为 `false`）来重定向到应用程序的登录页。When the method is called, a redirect to the application's login page is made by calling the method with the `endResponse` parameter set to `false`. 在当前页面执行完毕之前，不会进行重定向操作，因此可以运行其他代码。The redirect does not take place until the current page has finished executing, so additional code can be run. 如果代码不包含显式重定向到其他页，则会将用户重定向到在应用程序的配置文件中配置的登录页。If the code does not contain an explicit redirect to another page, the user is redirected to the login page configured in the application's configuration file. 调用 方法仅删除 forms 身份验证 cookie。Calling the method only removes the forms authentication cookie. Web 服务器不存储有效和过期的身份验证票证，以便以后进行比较。The Web server does not store valid and expired authentication tickets for later comparison. 如果恶意用户获得有效的 forms 身份验证 cookie，这会使你的站点容易遭受重播攻击。This makes your site vulnerable to a replay attack if a malicious user obtains a valid forms authentication cookie. 若要在使用窗体身份验证 cookie 时提高安全性，应执行以下操作：To improve security when using a forms authentication cookie, you should do the following: - 通过将 属性设置为 `false`，将绝对过期用于窗体身份验证 cookie。Use absolute expiration for forms authentication cookies by setting the property to `false`. 这限制了可重播劫持 cookie 的窗口。This limits the window in which a hijacked cookie can be replayed. - 仅在安全套接字层（SSL）上颁发和接受身份验证 cookie，方法是将 属性设置为 `true`，并在 SSL 下运行整个网站。Only issue and accept authentication cookies over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), by setting the property to `true` and by running the entire Web site under SSL. 将 属性设置为 `true` 可确保 ASP.NET 不会通过非 SSL 连接将身份验证 cookie 发送到浏览器;但是，客户端可能不会服从 cookie 上的安全设置。Setting the property to `true` ensures that ASP.NET will never send an authentication cookie to the browser over a non-SSL connection; however, the client might not honor the secure setting on the cookie. 这意味着客户端可能会通过非 SSL 连接发送 forms 身份验证 cookie，从而使其易于劫持。This means the client might send the forms authentication cookie over a non-SSL connection, thus leaving it vulnerable to hijack. 可以通过在 SSL 下运行整个网站来阻止客户端以明文形式发送 forms 身份验证 cookie。You can prevent a client from sending the forms authentication cookie in the clear by running the entire Web site under SSL. - 使用服务器上的永久存储来记录用户何时从网站注销，然后使用应用程序事件（例如 事件）来确定当前用户是否已通过 forms 身份验证进行身份验证。Use persistent storage on the server to record when a user logs out of the Web site, and then use an application event such as event to determine whether the current user was authenticated with forms authentication. 如果用户已通过 forms 身份验证进行身份验证，并且持久性存储区中的信息指示用户已注销，则立即清除身份验证 cookie，并将浏览器重定向回登录页。If the user was authenticated with forms authentication, and if the information in persistent storage indicates the user is logged out, immediately clear the authentication cookie and redirect the browser back to the login page. 成功登录后，更新存储以反映用户已登录。After a successful login, update storage to reflect that the user is logged in. 使用此方法时，应用程序必须跟踪用户的登录状态，并且必须强制空闲用户注销。When you use this method, your application must track the logged-in status of the user, and must force idle users to log out. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法清除 forms 身份验证 cookie，并使用 方法将用户重定向到登录页。The following code example clears the forms-authentication cookie using the method and redirects the user to the login page using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/CS/signoutcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/VB/signoutvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值使用[forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration 元素的 `slidingExpiration` 属性进行设置。The property value is set using the `slidingExpiration` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果发出了请求并且超过了一半的超时时间间隔，则滑动过期会重置有效身份验证 cookie 的过期时间。Sliding expiration resets the expiration time for a valid authentication cookie if a request is made and more than half of the timeout interval has elapsed. 如果 cookie 过期，用户必须重新进行身份验证。If the cookie expires, the user must re-authenticate. 将 属性设置为 `false` 可以通过基于配置的 `timeout` 值限制身份验证 cookie 的有效时间，从而提高应用程序的安全性。Setting the property to `false` can improve the security of an application by limiting the time for which an authentication cookie is valid, based on the configured `timeout` value. 如果将 `requireSSL` 配置为 `false`，则还需将 `slidingExpiration` 配置为 `false`，以缩短票证的有效时间。We recommend that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `slidingExpiration` 特性设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中的 `false`。The following code example sets the `slidingExpiration` attribute to `false` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```
